article_title: Sanders can fix what ails health care system
article_text:
Obamacare doesn’t go far enough to provide coverage

His Medicare for all plan will fill the gaps

Sanders also has the right values on climate change and other issues

article_metadata.news-keywords: nurses, health care, Bernie, Sanders, climate change, inequality, Democrats, 2016, presidential race, Obamacare, Affordable Care Act
article_metadata.description: He knows the Affordable Care Act doesn’t go nearly far enough in providing coverage. This is particularly acute in Sacramento County, where some 17 percent remain uninsured, and where our asthma, diabetes and cancer rates are above the state average.
article_metadata.title: Sanders can fix what ails health care system | The Sacramento Bee
